name: immich-drop
tagline: A simple upload portal for adding photos to Immich libraries
description: Immich Drop is a simple upload portal for Immich that allows guests to bulk upload photos into a specified album without needing full accounts. It is handy for events or shared collections where many people contribute media.

features.title: Public Upload Portal
features.description: Provides a simple upload interface for adding photos to an Immich instance

features.title: Shareable Upload Links
features.description: Allows photo uploads through links without requiring Immich user accounts

features.title: Bulk Upload Support
features.description: Enables uploading multiple photos in a single session

features.title: Album Targeting
features.description: Directs uploaded photos into predefined Immich albums

features.title: Access Limiting
features.description: Restricts upload access using link-based permissions

features.title: Browser-Based Interface
features.description: Accepts uploads through a standard web browser

features.title: Immich Integration
features.description: Stores uploaded media directly into the Immich media library

features.title: Self-Hosted Upload Tool
features.description: Runs alongside your own Immich deployment
